Hi All,

I have questions about radiation analysis. I succeed to visualize the radiation onto my surface ('LB' image). However, once I add geometries (ex: buildings), the result becomes strange. It seems the analysis only happen near the building/geometries (see 'LB2' image). Also, can someone explain me how's the '_disFromBase' measured? especially if I have non-planar surface. Is it measured from the lowest/top elevation of the surface or the center of my surface?

thank you in advance.
best,
